    public class Screen
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Screen is the GUI implementation of the Pong game
    Version:
    CS56, Spring 2013, UCSB
    Author:
    Timothy Fok, Jake Dumont, Heneli Kailahi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
